weekly_top_story.headline: FDA Approves Moderna's Updated COVID-19 Vaccines for 2025–2026 Season
weekly_top_story.summary: The FDA authorized Moderna's updated Spikevax® and mNEXSPIKE® vaccines to address current COVID-19 variants, emphasizing continued protection for older adults who remain at highest risk of severe disease and long-term complications.

stories.headline: VSee Launches AI Doctor Notes Reducing Documentation Time by 93% in Virtual Emergency Care
stories.summary: VSee Health introduced AI-powered doctor notes integrated with Tele911’s virtual emergency care, dramatically reducing clinical documentation time and improving workflow efficiency in telehealth emergency services.

stories.headline: Teladoc Health Launches Wellbound Employee Assistance Program to Enhance Workforce Health
stories.summary: Teladoc Health unveiled Wellbound, a new employee assistance program aimed at promoting engagement and better health outcomes within organizational workforces through virtual care services.
